title: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg urged to help protect civil rights

title: New Facebook features fight election lies everywhere but ads
text: Heaven forbid a political candidate’s Facebook account gets hacked. They might spread disinformation…like they’re already allowed to do in Facebook ads… Today Facebook made a slew of announcements designed to stop 2020 election interference.

title: Zuckerberg unveils Facebook’s new security measures to combat 2020 election interference
text: Facebook Inc. says it has fortified its digital defenses to eradicate meddling in elections, and it’s already thwarted new interference attempts from Russian and Iran as a result.

title: Facebook removes four networks of fake pages and accounts tied to Russia and Iran
text: Facebook on Monday announced that it removed four networks of "coordinated inauthentic behavior" tied to Russia and Iran from its services.

title: Facebook Open To Changes To Libra Vision Ahead Of June 2020 Launch
text: Social media company Facebook, Inc. (NASDAQ: FB) is proceeding with its Libra initiative, but the initial vision of a single, synthetic digital currency could change, Reuters reported Sunday.

title: Is It Time For Facebook To Swipe Right On Match Group?
text: Trefis details why Facebook could potentially acquire Match Group, and how much the company can pay to acquire the company that owns Tinder, OkCupid and PlentyOfFish, among others. Our estimate is based on Match Group’s standalone value as well as its value as a part of the combined entity.

title: Facebook says Libra could use a series of cryptocurrencies pegged to different currencies
text: Facebook's David Marcus says Libra could use "a series of stablecoins" pegged to currencies like the dollar, the euro and sterling.
